title: 017 - AJ Hawk Joins The Pod For A Full Tiger King Recap
description: On today's show, 10 year NFL veteran, Super Bowl Champion, 5th overall pick of the 2006 NFL Draft, host of the HawkCast and cohost of McAfee & Hawk Sports Talk, friend of PMI, AJ Hawk joins the boys via FaceTime. They give a full recap of everything that happened in the Netflix phenomenon "Tiger King" and give their thoughts, reactions, and also try to cast the eventual biopic that we hope will be coming out soon. The guys also recap the Sweet Sixteen of March Sadness and look ahead to the Elite 8 where America's Sweetheart, SDDEO (she doesn't dump em out) looks to continue its storybook run to a national title. Today's a fun one. Stay safe this weekend, and enjoy.
dc:creator: The Pod
